alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 4:16PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Thunderstorms near Mackay Reservoir moving southeast toward Mackay and the Custer County Fair through 445 PM MDT... At 413 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Mackay Reservoir, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 30 mph, pea to half inch hail, brief moderate rain, and occasional lighting. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs, blow around unsecured objects like tents. Locations impacted include... Mackay, Grouse, and Mackay Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building or vehicle. Persons attending the Custer County Fair in Mackay should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys
